addInstanceScreen.heading: Connect to Confluence
addInstanceScreen.subHeading: Please provide the address you use to access Confluence.
addInstanceScreen.aggreementMessage: With continue, you agree to our {link1} and {link2}.

loginScreen.heading: Connect to Confluence
loginScreen.subHeading: Please choose your Confluence, or let us detect it for you!

errorMessages.cannontConnectYasoonDescription: We couldn't connect to our backend server at *.yasoon.com. This might be caused by a restrictive firewall. Please make sure to add (or ask your IT to add) yasoon.com to the whitelist
errorMessages.notifyForServerVersionDescription: We currently only support Confluence Cloud instances. Get a notification when the app is available for Confluence Server
errorMessages.invalidCredentialsDescription: Please check your credentials and try again. If this issue persists contact your Confluence Admin and make sure Basic Auth is enabled.
errorMessages.invalidUserDescription: You can't use the app as an anonymous user.
errorMessages.errorDuringLoginDescription: Please check your credentials and try again. If this issue persists contact your Confluence Admin and make sure Basic Auth is enabled.
errorMessages.serverAppNotInstalled: Sorry, we coudln't find our app on the Confluence System. You can get the app over at the {link}
errorMessages.cloudAppNotInstalled: We coudln't find our app with the given Confluence url. Please check, if the app is installed
errorMessages.serverAppNotConfigured: Your Confluence Administrator hasn't configured our app yet. To continue please contact your Confluence administrator!
errorMessages.serverAppNotConfiguredTitle: The Confluence App hasn't been configured
errorMessages.serverNotPublicOrBadBaseUrl: Our backend-server was not able to reach your Confluence system. Either there is a typo in the url, or the confluence System is not public reachable
errorMessages.couldNotCreateInstance: Unfortunately we could not create the instance automatically. Please enter the publicly available Confluence Url on the right.
errorMessages.dialogVanishedDescription: Please execute the login in the opened popup.

createMeetingNotes.heading: Create meeting page
createMeetingNotes.pageNameAlreadyExistsError: There is already a page with this name.
createMeetingNotes.deleteMeetingNotesTootlip: Click to delete the meeting notes page.
createMeetingNotes.deleteMeetingNotesDraftTootlip: The meeting page will be created when you send the meeting request. Click to delete the draft.

initalPageSelection.heading: Select the meeting notes location
initalPageSelection.description: You are just a little step away from creating your first Confluence Meeting notes directly from your Outlook. First, please select the location where you want to create your meeting notes. Note: You can then change this location afterwards.

meetingAgenda.heading: Agenda
meetingAgenda.editToAdjustEndtime: Edit the meeting to adjust the end time

noConfluencePage.heading: No meeting notes page found
noConfluencePage.description: Could not find a related Confluence page. If you are the organizer you can add an agenda when editing the event.

welcomeScreen.heading: Welcome to Outlook Meetings for Confluence
welcomeScreen.createConfluencePage: Create a Confluence page for your meeting request.
welcomeScreen.planMeetingAgenda: Plan a meeting agenda direktly in Outlook: Add agenda items, durations and speakers
welcomeScreen.collaborativelyAddAndChangeAgenda: Collaboratively add and change talking points with your team in Outlook

editor.collapsedPlaceholder: Click to edit the page description

instanceSettings.currentlyNotLoggedIn: You are currently not logged in.

errorBoundary.heading: Something went wrong :/
errorBoundary.persistMessage: If this error persists please open a support ticket.

templateTable.noCustomTemplates: No custom templates selected. Select the first template in the picker underneath

adminScreen.heading: Outlook Meetings for Confluence
adminScreen.outlookAddinDescription: The corresponding Outlook add-in can be downloaded from the Microsoft AppSource store, just click on the following link. If you need help deploying the add-in in your company, we are happy to help.
adminScreen.templatesDescription: In addition to the standard page template, you can also use any existing or new template for your meeting notes. Please edit the existing page template so that the app can work properly. The template must include the 'Meeting Agenda Macro' macro that comes with the app and can contain placeholders for, {{Attendees}}, {{Loaction}}, {{Description}} and {{Date}}.
adminScreen.helpDescription: If you need further help or have any questions, you can find more information in our documentation. For suggestions or bugs in our app, please open a support ticket.
adminScreen.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Outlook Meetings for Confluence.
adminScreen.confirmModalText: Please enter the url under which your Confluence system is reachable from the internet. If you change the existing public base url of your system, all users will be logged out of the current instance.
adminScreen.loadingHeader: Checking if the app is functioning properly
adminScreen.loadingMessage: Sit back and let us do the work, or get yourself a coffee ☕️
adminScreen.publicUrlTooltip: This is the public reachable url of you Confluence Server instance

meetingAgendaMacro.title: Title
meetingAgendaMacro.noItemsMessage: This meeting notes page has no items. You can add items by editing the macro. If you need futher help
meetingAgendaMacro.documentationLink: have a look at our documentation

templatePlaceholder.description: This is a placeholder you don't need to configure it.
templatePlaceholder.heading: You are all set.

instanceChooser.heading: Confluence Instance
instanceChooser.subHeading: Please select the Confluence Instance you would like to connect to.
instanceChooser.disabledTooltip: Please install the corresponding Confluence app first.
